root.name: Chuck Gnome
root.description: Overview Chuck Gnome is developed by Movable Sprites and was released August 4, 2010. The original game shipped with five levels and one bonus level. OpenFeint is included in the game. Gameplay It's a shooting gallery style game where the player chucks gnomes (using a rubber band at the bottom of the screen) at targets. As the player clears targets, the storyline of the level progresses and new scene choreography and targets appear. You start with 100 seconds and can earn more time by hitting certain targets. Â Music Soundtrack by Tapani Siirtola of Sound Real Finland
